item.description:
Join us for a delightful evening making handmade greeting cards, enjoying homemade cupcakes, some appetizers and cocktails.

Stacey Clinton of Stampin Up will be our guide for the evening- she will be providing all the supplies to make our handmade cards. Each guest will be able to make 5 greeting cards of your own design. There is a $7 fee for each guest for card making supplies for the evening. If you'd like, you can make some cards to send to children in hospital or the elderly in nursing homes.

I will be making some homemade cupcakes and will have some appetizers for us all to enjoy. Please bring your beverage of choice (all drinks are welcome!).

This will be a fun evening- try an engaging and creative activity, meet some friendly and interesting people and enjoy good food and drinks!

We will be meeting at my place in Hopedale. The exact address will be emailed to those who have signed up, a couple of days before the event. Look forward to seeing you!
item.name: An Evening of Cards, Cupcakes and Cocktails!
